description: MCP Server Configuration for QA Engineers - Optimized Testing Bundle

playwright.description: E2E browser automation and testing (Microsoft official)
use_cases: Create and run E2E tests across browsers
playwright.why_essential: Industry-standard E2E testing framework with AI integration

github.description: GitHub integration for bug tracking and test automation CI/CD
use_cases: Create detailed bug reports with reproduction steps
Comment test results on pull requests
Track test failures and flaky tests
Integrate with GitHub Actions for CI/CD
Link tests to requirements in issues
github.why_essential: Critical for bug tracking and test automation workflows

filesystem.description: Test file management and fixture handling
use_cases: Manage test files and test suites
Read/write test fixtures and mock data
filesystem.why_essential: Essential for test file and fixture management

a11y-mcp.description: AI-powered accessibility testing with Axe-core integration
use_cases: ARIA validation and keyboard navigation testing
Test against wcag2a, wcag2aa, wcag2aaa standards
a11y-mcp.why_essential: Automated a11y testing is required for WCAG compliance

memory.description: Persistent test case and bug investigation context
use_cases: Store test scenarios and edge cases
Maintain test execution context across sessions
memory.why_recommended: Improves test planning with historical context

sequential-thinking.description: Structured test strategy planning and root cause analysis
use_cases: Debugging flaky tests with structured approach
sequential-thinking.why_recommended: Essential for senior QA engineers doing test architecture

postgres.description: Database testing and test data management
use_cases: Set up test data in databases
Query database state for test assertions
Inspect database schema for integration tests
postgres.why_recommended: Critical for integration and data validation testing
postgres.security_note: Use dedicated test database with appropriate permissions

e2e_test_creation: 1. Use Sequential-thinking to plan test scenarios
2. Use Playwright to implement E2E tests
3. Use Filesystem to save test files
4. Use Memory to store test patterns
5. Use GitHub to link tests to requirements
accessibility_audit: 1. Use A11y MCP to run WCAG compliance checks
2. Use Playwright for keyboard navigation testing
4. Use GitHub to create accessibility issues
5. Use Memory to track remediation progress
bug_investigation: 1. Use Sequential-thinking for root cause analysis
2. Use Playwright to reproduce the bug
3. Use PostgreSQL to verify database state
4. Use GitHub to search for similar issues
5. Use Memory to store investigation findings
6. Use GitHub to create detailed bug report
visual_regression: 2. Use Filesystem to manage baseline images
4. Use Memory to store diff results
5. Use GitHub to comment on PR with results
test_data_setup: 1. Use PostgreSQL to create test database schema
2. Use PostgreSQL to insert test data fixtures
3. Use Filesystem to save fixture scripts
4. Use Memory to cache test data patterns
5. Use Playwright to validate data in UI

playwright: Run tests in parallel for speed
a11y_mcp: Run on every PR with GitHub Actions
sequential_thinking: Use 5 Whys for root cause analysis
postgres: Use transaction rollback for test isolation
Clean up test data after execution

optimization_tips: Playwright: Run in parallel, use sharded execution for large suites
A11y MCP: Cache results for unchanged pages, run only on modified components
PostgreSQL: Use test database snapshots for faster setup/teardown
Memory: Store flaky test patterns to identify and fix systemic issues
Sequential-thinking: Use for complex scenarios, not simple test cases
